summary: On a spooky island, three stranded travelers find an evil doctor working with foreign spies and in control of zombies.
cast: Dick Purcell|Joan Woodbury|Mantan Moreland|Henry Victor|John Archer|Patricia Stacey|Guy Usher|Marguerite Whitten|Leigh Whipper|Madame Sul-Te-Wan|James Davis|Laurence Criner|Josephine Whitten
title: El rey de los zombies
